text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Looks like this approach isn't gonna work either.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Now I gotta undo it… I guess I'll upload that other one first.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: So, I have something to ask you!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: If I win, will you be my date for the Droite?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Sure, but don't lose, okay? If you do, I might go with somebody else!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Ugh, it's that time of year already. Not that it makes any difference to me. A text?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: "Tracen Academy's Student Council President, Symboli Rudolf"…? What's with the title? Wait… What?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: "We formally request your presence at the Ligne Droite"?
Event title logo display.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ligne Droite, or more commonly Droite. When the cherry blossoms are in bloom and the new year is beginning, we hold this extravagant dance to commemorate it.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: As this day approaches, my cute little ponies become nervous. Naturally, they worry about finding nice clothes to wear, But the biggest thing on their minds is…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Finding a partner to dance with for the majority of the night. Yes! Fitting for this turning point in their lives, They must find an equally lovely date!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Snzzz…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Oh no, was that a little too boring? I'm sorry. Will you open your eyes, Princess?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: What did you wake me for? I was having such a comfy afternoon nap. Dro… What was it again?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Droite, remember? I'm about to say something that will really wake you up, so brace yourself. Well… Will you lend your ear to my feelings?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Seiun Sky, Won't you please… be my date?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Uh…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: No, hang on. Wait, what do you mean by "date", anyway? You want me to be your partner for the dance?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Exactly that! We've decided to hold an exhibition dance at the Droite, you see… It'll act as the opening act to the main event. To liven things up!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: We do this every year, but… Our Kaichou, she really wants to make this a success, And I wanted to contribute, so I proposed a plan.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hmm…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: You don't sound very excited about it, huh? Makes sense, I suppose. Everyone's busy with races… We'd like as many girls as possible to attend, though.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: So that's why you've turned into a giant billboard. But why pick me to be your partner?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: To begin with, we have nothing in common. I'm not in the Rittou dorm, And I'm not on any committee or whatever either.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Right now, we're students in the same school. Wouldn't you call that a connection? Though it might be broader than what you meant. Putting that aside,

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: You're correct that typically, when choosing a date… you would pick someone you're already close with in your daily life.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: The Droite acts as a milestone event, after all. Of course you'd want a person who really left a mark on your year. That's only natural.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: "When I win, I want you as my prize." You know! Plenty of girls use races to win their partner over.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: So then…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: However! What I'm in charge of is ultimately an exhibition. So, I only have one condition. I need them to help make the Droite a rousing success.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: And when I thought about who could make that happen… I remembered the girl known as the Trickster, I knew it had to be you!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I get it. Well, definitely not your train of thought, But I get that you're serious about this.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Because of that, I'll be very clear. No thank you. I have no interest in participating. Please choose someone else.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Though I know you must be planning something… I don't want to attract weird levels of attention. Plus, you can't convince me to dance outside of a live. And anyway…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I don't… have much free time on my hands right now. I've been wanting to kinda focus my effort on the next race.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I understand. Then, how about I make you an offer? May I suggest a trade?

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Woah, a jump shot! That height was insane! But that's just like you, Sirius-senpai!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: This is lame. I'm bored out of my mind, and it's not even satisfying. I'm done playing pool.

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Wait, already?! My day off finally lined up with yours, though…! Uhh, let's see… I need something interesting, or like, exciting somehow…
(Chring…)

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Oh, nice timing! Senpai, senpai! I've been really into this one producer! Like, just now they put out a new track. Wanna hear?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Oh, can I?

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: Definitely! They go by !monad. They're kind of a mystery, They only come on social media to post music and remixes!

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: They're like, insanely cool! They have this aggressive, super tight sound! And it's all old school, west coast style. It's awesome!

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: …Wait, sorry, I got too excited. Anyway, just listen! Here's their account.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: !monad… Their profile is empty, except for their username and their music uploads. Wait, their icon…

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: So like, ehehe… To be honest, I was thinking about this year's…

text_block_list.name: Sirius's Groupie A
text_block_list.text: S-Sirius-senpai…!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: You seem right as rain, Sirius Symboli.
